articles.description: It's so much more than a game.
articles.content:
On Tuesday night, the U.S. men's soccer team (USMNT) edged Iran for a 1-0 win to advance to round 16 of the 2022 World Cup. 
While the match itself was certainly intense with all eyes on the world-w… [+3138 chars]

articles.title: Larry Fitzgerald Backstory Suggests Patrick Peterson Was Probably Right About Kyler Murray - Pro Football Network
articles.description: Kyler Murray is an unbelievable physical talent. But Patrick Peterson's comments continue a disturbing trend surrounding the Cardinals QB.
